slides.title: Strategic performance has improved and supports measured expansion.
slides.subtitle: Consulting quality fixture

slides.title: Revenue performance improved materially and now exceeds target expectations.

bullets.detail: Quarterly revenue increased by 33% from Q1 to Q4 based on reported figures.
Q4 revenue outperformed target by 14%, confirming momentum in core demand.
Leadership should prioritise scalable delivery capacity in the next planning cycle.

slides.title: Quarterly revenue has risen consistently and validates the operating strategy.
slides.insight: Revenue increases each quarter and Q4 confirms sustained outperformance versus prior quarters.

slides.title: The organisation should convert momentum into a focused expansion plan next term.

bullets.detail: Leadership should approve a phased capacity programme with clear ownership and milestones.
Weekly review of delivery constraints should prevent quality erosion during growth.
Track conversion, retention, and margin indicators to confirm expansion is sustainable.
